text: Jorge Ramos √Åvalos (born March 16, 1958) is a Mexican journalist for Univision. He is the anchor for Noticiero Univision and host of the Sunday morning news talk show Al Punto. Also, on Fusion TV, he hosts America with Jorge Ramos, which debuted on October 29, 2013. Ramos was born on March 16, 1958 in Mexico City, Mexico. He studied at Universidad Iberoamericana.
